com.uber.simplestore

Interface SimpleStore

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.io.Closeable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    PrimitiveSimpleStore

    public interface SimpleStore
extends java.io.Closeable
    Fast, reliable storage.
